GSD.product_version: versions from v3.17 to before v5.10.127
GSD.description:
ARM: exynos: Fix refcount leak in exynos_map_pmu

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.127 by commit 68f28d52e6cbab8dcfa249cac4356d1d0573e868, it was introduced in version v3.17 by commit fce9e5bb25264153f9f002eada41757118d25ba9. For more details please see the references link.
